entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 34 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast overnight. Low minus 24. Wind chill near minus 38. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Sunday 26 February 2023
